title: Launch botton not working
body: I am opening the launch client and I press launch but than nothing else happen it does not bring me to the login screen it just sort of closes. I hope you can help Thanks -Snowace21

replies.body:
This happens if your connection to the login servers is *unstable*. This is often caused by incompatible network settings that simply conflict with League. Our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) is an awesome resource for common solutions and I strongly recommend giving it a go.

Let me know if those steps helped.
